mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as userName FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, user_no) VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as userName FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no AND b.no = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE no=#{no} AND user_no=#{userNo}
